Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between SW-EIC Accept and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to be done after Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time until Awaiting Assignment to Batch is performed following First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-EIC Accept and Awaiting Assignment to Batch across all process variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average waiting time to the Awaiting Assignment to Batch after completion of First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total resolution time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch relative to the preceding Manuscript Export Succeeded activity in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to occur after the final decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed appears only once
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time for Awaiting Assignment to Batch in process variants that transition through First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Elapsed time between the last reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed or RW-Reviewer Agreed) and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Awaiting Assignment to Batch grouped by case:concept:name
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'end': "activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"

Name: Average time to Awaiting Assignment to Batch grouped by the type of final editorial decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept vs. RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'end': "activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
